Parameter.name: PluginId
Parameter.Description: ID's 1-999 are reserved, custom plugins start with 1000

Parameter.name: Order
Parameter.Description: Order in which they appear in dropdown lists

Parameter.name: ShortDescription
Parameter.Default: This plugin allows you to select data using an iFind index. You just have to specify the concept like an ordinary Similar plugin (but you can add a * before or after for wildcards)

Method.name: GetPlugin
Method.Description: SQL needs to give words & metafieldid
